channel.title: 2 simple quations
channel.description:
Yes i have some bugs i cant fix i have search for it i never get it..
First bug: Now i add a new shop i go first in shops and add shop = 42 @yel@Fankascape's_Barrow_Shop! 2 2 4720 100 4722 100 4716 100 4718 100 4151 100 4724 100 4728 100 4730 100 4726 100 4708 100 4710 100 4712 100 4714 100 4745 100 4747 100 4749 100 4751 100
So i go in client and add } else if (NPCID == 1917) { //Bandit_shopkeeper PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 40; // @yel@Fankascape's_Barrow_Shop!
So i go in autospawn and spawn = 1917 2207 3257 0 0 0 0 0 1 NewNPC
So i save and compile.. i go in my server i trade with my npc Nothing!? its not open the trade window..
I tryed the talk command to working not Heelp
Another question..
Now i go in npcdrops and try to make a new drops to npc like npcdrop = 1444 2 4723 2 4721 2 4719 2 4717 2 4756 2 4754 2 4758 2 4760 2
And i go in autospawn and add the npc
I go in the server the npc is there now i kill it its drop nothing...
I try self spawned the npc nothing HELP
I use cheezscape pk souce
[br][size=1]Posted at: September 04, 2006, 12:01:14 PM[/size][hr]Omg help!?[br][size=1]Posted at: September 04, 2006, 12:11:23 PM[/size][hr]Are all dead/stupid or something :D

item.description:
@Danish-Hax0r wrote:

Yes i have some bugs i cant fix i have search for it i never get it…

First bug: Now i add a new shop i go first in shops and add shop = 42 @yel@Fankascape’s_Barrow_Shop! 2 2 4720 100 4722 100 4716 100 4718 100 4151 100 4724 100 4728 100 4730 100 4726 100 4708 100 4710 100 4712 100 4714 100 4745 100 4747 100 4749 100 4751 100

So i go in client and add } else if (NPCID == 1917) { //Bandit_shopkeeper
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 40; // @yel@Fankascape’s_Barrow_Shop!

So i go in autospawn and spawn = 1917 2207 3257 0 0 0 0 0 1 NewNPC

So i save and compile… i go in my server i trade with my npc Nothing!? its not open the trade window…

I tryed the talk command to working not Heelp

Another question…

Now i go in npcdrops and try to make a new drops to npc like npcdrop = 1444 2 4723 2 4721 2 4719 2 4717 2 4756 2 4754 2 4758 2 4760 2

And i go in autospawn and add the npc

I go in the server the npc is there now i kill it its drop nothing…

I try self spawned the npc nothing HELP

I use cheezscape pk souce
